Problem still exists in build 20020501

STEPS
1) Change the definition of the action org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui.Display in the 
plugin.xml for org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui to

<action id="org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui.Display" 
			label="%Display.label" 
			menubarPath="org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugMenu/jdtGroup"
			icon="icons/full/etool16/disp_sbook.gif"

			helpContextId="display_action_context"
		
	class="org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.actions.DisplayAction"
			enablesFor="+">
		</action>

2) Create the following class

public class Foo{

		System.out.println("Bar");
	}

3) Put a breakpoint in the System.out call
4) Debug it
